extendedInfo.description: Word Whisk is one of the most addictive word games for Android. It goes beyond typical Boggle or Word Search games by featuring many distinct puzzle modes, including same-device and bluetooth multiplayer!Earn XP and coins as you play through the game to unlock new modes and themes!Here are a few of the game modes you can unlock:- Basic Play (Easy, Medium, Hard difficulties)- Fast To Fifty - Score 50 points as quickly as possible! Try to break the 2 minute barrier and win a special prize.- Quick Draw - Word search game. Find and spell the word given to you as quickly as possible on the board.- Free Play - Find every word possible on the game board! Features a save/load feature so you can pick up where you left off.... plus many others!Other features include:- 8 distinct background animations and themes.- Support for multiple user accounts on the same device.- A detailed help system.- Local and Bluetooth multiplayer.- Over 40 achievement badges to earn!- Detailed stats of every game saved to your profile.

reviews.title: Word whisk
reviews.comment: Love the concept but why so many force closes Grr??? Fix this and my rating would be 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: fc\'s and hard crashes constantly. I lost all my progress because the game broke itself. Now I can\'t even get through one game without it crashing.
